<section id="A3" class="ltx_appendix">
<h2 class="ltx_title ltx_title_appendix">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_appendix">Appendix C </span>SMT encoding example</h2>

<div id="A3.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A3.p1.2" class="ltx_p">To ease the understanding of the encoding process between the State Transition Model and the SMT problem, we consider in the following a simple strategy with only two actions, and a trader holding two cryptocurrency assets: a <em id="A3.p1.2.1" class="ltx_emph ltx_font_italic">base</em> cryptocurrency asset <math id="A3.p1.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="c_{1}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p1.1.m1.1a"><msub id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.2" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.2.cmml">c</mi><mn id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.3" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.3.cmml">1</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p1.1.m1.1b"><apply id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.2">𝑐</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p1.1.m1.1.1.3">1</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p1.1.m1.1c">c_{1}</annotation></semantics></math>, and another cryptocurrency asset <math id="A3.p1.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="c_{2}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p1.2.m2.1a"><msub id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.2" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.2.cmml">c</mi><mn id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.3" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.3.cmml">2</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p1.2.m2.1b"><apply id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.2">𝑐</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p1.2.m2.1.1.3">2</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p1.2.m2.1c">c_{2}</annotation></semantics></math>.</p>
</div>
<div id="A3.p2" class="ltx_para ltx_noindent">
<p id="A3.p2.8" class="ltx_p"><span id="A3.p2.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Action <math id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="a_{1}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1a"><msub id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.2" xref="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.2.cmml">a</mi><mn id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.3" id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.2">𝑎</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.cmml" <table id="A3.E14" class="ltx_equation ltx_eqn_table">

<tbody><tr class="ltx_equation ltx_eqn_row ltx_align_baseline">
<td class="ltx_eqn_cell ltx_eqn_center_padleft"></td>
<td class="ltx_eqn_cell ltx_align_center"><math id="A3.E14.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\text{output amount of }c_{2}=L1^{c_{2}}-\frac{L1^{c_{1}}L1^{c_{2}}}{(L1^{c_{1}}+x_{1})}" display="block"><semantics id="A3.E14.m1.1a"><mrow id="A3.E14.m1.1.2" xref="A3.E14.m1.1.2.cmml"><mrow id="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2" xref="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2.cmml"><mtext id="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2.2" xref="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2.2a.cmml">output amount of&nbsp;</mtext><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2.1" xref="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2.1.cmml">​</mo><msub id="A3.E14.m1.1.2.2.3" liquidity <math id="A3.p3.5.m4.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="L2^{c_{1}}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p3.5.m4.1a"><mrow id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.2" id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.2" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.2.cmml">2</mn><msub id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.cmml"><mi id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.2" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.2.cmml">c</mi><mn id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.3" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.3.cmml">1</mn></msub></msup></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p3.5.m4.1b"><apply id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1"><times id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.1"></times><ci id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.2">𝐿</ci><apply id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3">superscript</csymbol><cn type="integer" id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.2">2</cn><apply id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3">subscript</csymbol><ci xref="A3.p3.5.m4.1.1.3.3.3">1</cn></apply></apply></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p3.5.m4.1c">L2^{c_{1}}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math id="A3.p3.6.m5.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="L2^{c_{2}}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p3.6.m5.1a"><mrow id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.2" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.2.cmml">L</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.1" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.1.cmml">​</mo><msup id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.cmml"><mn id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.2" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.2.cmml">2</mn><msub id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.cmml"><mi id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.2" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.2.cmml">c</mi><mn id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.3" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.3.cmml">2</mn></msub></msup></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1b"><apply id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1"><times id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.1"></times><ci id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.2">𝐿</ci><apply id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3">superscript</csymbol><cn type="integer" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.2">2</cn><apply id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.2">𝑐</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.6.m5.1.1.3.3.3">2</cn></apply></apply></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p3.6.m5.1c">L2^{c_{2}}</annotation></semantics></math>. Based on Heuristic 5 (cf. Section&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#S5.SS2" title="V-B Path Pruning ‣ V Design of DeFiPoser-SMT ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag"><span class="ltx_text">V-B</span></span></a>), action <math id="A3.p3.7.m6.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="a_{2}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p3.7.m6.1a"><msub id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.2" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.2.cmml">a</mi><mn id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.3" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.3.cmml">2</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p3.7.m6.1b"><apply id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.2">𝑎</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.7.m6.1.1.3">2</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p3.7.m6.1c">a_{2}</annotation></semantics></math> must use another market, because otherwise the conversion becomes a reversing action of <math id="A3.p3.8.m7.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="a_{1}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p3.8.m7.1a"><msub id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.2" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.2.cmml">a</mi><mn id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.3" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.3.cmml">1</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p3.8.m7.1b"><apply id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.2">𝑎</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p3.8.m7.1.1.3">1</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p3.8.m7.1c">a_{1}</annotation></semantics></math>, which would result in a zero-sum game with a loss on transaction fees.</p>
</div>
<div id="A3.p4" class="ltx_para ltx_noindent">
<p id="A3.p4.1" class="ltx_p"><span id="A3.p4.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Initial state encoding:</span>
Equation&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A3.E15" title="In Appendix C SMT encoding example ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">15</span></a> encodes the state variables with concrete values, which are fetched from the considered blockchain state (e.g., the most recent block). This predicate can also be viewed as the assignment of an initial state.</p>
</div>

<div id="A3.p6" class="ltx_para ltx_noindent">
<p id="A3.p6.8" class="ltx_p"><span id="A3.p6.8.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Action encoding:</span>
The following two predicates encode the two state transition actions. xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.2.3">1</cn></apply><apply id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3.cmml" xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3.2.cmml" xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3.2">𝑐</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3.3.cmml" xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.2.3.3.3">2</cn></apply></apply></apply><apply id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.3.cmml" xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.3"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.3">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1.1.3.3.2.cmml" encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.E17Xg.2.1.1.m1.1c">\displaystyle L2_{2}^{c_{2}}=L2_{1}^{c_{2}}+x_{2}</annotation></semantics></math></td>
<td class="ltx_eqn_cell ltx_eqn_center_padright"></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<div id="A3.p9" class="ltx_para ltx_noindent">
<p id="A3.p9.1" class="ltx_p"><span id="A3.p9.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Objective encoding:</span></p>
</div>
<div id="A3.p10" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A3.p10.4" class="ltx_p">We use <math id="A3.p10.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="Z" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p10.1.m1.1a"><mi id="A3.p10.1.m1.1.1" xref="A3.p10.1.m1.1.1.cmml">Z</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p10.1.m1.1b"><ci id="A3.p10.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p10.1.m1.1.1">𝑍</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p10.1.m1.1c">Z</annotation></semantics></math> to denote the targeted adversarial revenue. Equation&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A3.E18" title="In Appendix C SMT encoding example ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">18</span></a> encodes the objective constraints, ensuring that the adversarial cryptocurrency asset portfolio increases in value. Note that we rely on search algorithms (cf. Algorithm&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#alg2" title="In VI-B DeFiPoser-SMT ‣ VI Experimental Evaluation ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">2</span></a>) to find the highest possible <math id="A3.p10.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="Z" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p10.2.m2.1a"><mi id="A3.p10.2.m2.1.1" xref="A3.p10.2.m2.1.1.cmml">Z</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p10.2.m2.1b"><ci id="A3.p10.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p10.2.m2.1.1">𝑍</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p10.2.m2.1c">Z</annotation></semantics></math>. The optimization process requires solving the same SMT problem with different concrete initialization of revenue targets <math id="A3.p10.3.m3.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="Z" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p10.3.m3.1a"><mi id="A3.p10.3.m3.1.1" xref="A3.p10.3.m3.1.1.cmml">Z</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p10.3.m3.1b"><ci id="A3.p10.3.m3.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p10.3.m3.1.1">𝑍</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p10.3.m3.1c">Z</annotation></semantics></math> (predicate <math id="A3.p10.4.m4.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="t_{4}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p10.4.m4.1a"><msub id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.2" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.3" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.3.cmml">4</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p10.4.m4.1b"><apply id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.2">𝑡</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p10.4.m4.1.1.3">4</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p10.4.m4.1c">t_{4}</annotation></semantics></math>).</p>
</div>
<div id="A3.p11" class="ltx_para">

encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.E18Xa.2.1.1.m1.2c">\displaystyle\mathcal{B}^{\mathbb{T}}_{0}(c_{1})&gt;=\mathcal{B}^{\mathbb{T}}_{2}(c_{1})+Z\ \land</annotation></semantics></math></td>

<div id="A3.p12" class="ltx_para ltx_noindent">
<p id="A3.p12.6" class="ltx_p"><span id="A3.p12.6.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Free variables and range:</span>
Our model only consists of two free variables (<math id="A3.p12.1.m1.2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="x_{1},x_{2}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p12.1.m1.2a"><mrow id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.3.cmml"><msub id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2.cmml">x</mi><mn id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3.cmml">1</mn></msub><mo id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.3" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.3.cmml">,</mo><msub id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.cmml"><mi id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2.cmml">x</mi><mn id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3.cmml">2</mn></msub></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p12.1.m1.2b"><list id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.3.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2"><apply id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2">𝑥</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3">1</cn></apply><apply id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2">𝑥</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3.cmml" xref="A3.p12.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3">2</cn></apply></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p12.1.m1.2c">x_{1},x_{2}</annotation></semantics></math>) for the simple two action paths. For a path of arbitrary length <math id="A3.p12.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="n" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p12.2.m2.1a"><mi id="A3.p12.2.m2.1.1" xref="A3.p12.2.m2.1.1.cmml">n</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p12.2.m2.1b"><ci id="A3.p12.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.2.m2.1.1">𝑛</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p12.2.m2.1c">n</annotation></semantics></math>, the corresponding SMT system consists of <math id="A3.p12.3.m3.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="n" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p12.3.m3.1a"><mi id="A3.p12.3.m3.1.1" xref="A3.p12.3.m3.1.1.cmml">n</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p12.3.m3.1b"><ci id="A3.p12.3.m3.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.3.m3.1.1">𝑛</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p12.3.m3.1c">n</annotation></semantics></math> free variables, which are the parameters of each action. As shown in predicate <math id="A3.p12.4.m4.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="t_{2}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p12.4.m4.1a"><msub id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.2" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.3" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.3.cmml">2</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p12.4.m4.1b"><apply id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.2">𝑡</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p12.4.m4.1.1.3">2</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p12.4.m4.1c">t_{2}</annotation></semantics></math> (cf. Equation&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A3.E16" title="In Appendix C SMT encoding example ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">16</span></a>) and <math id="A3.p12.5.m5.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="t_{3}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p12.5.m5.1a"><msub id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.2" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.3" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.3.cmml">3</mn></msub><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p12.5.m5.1b"><apply id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.2">𝑡</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p12.5.m5.1.1.3">3</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p12.5.m5.1c">t_{3}</annotation></semantics></math> (cf. Equation&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A3.E17" title="In Appendix C SMT encoding example ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">17</span></a>), the range of free variables are constraint by the amount of <math id="A3.p12.6.m6.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\mathbb{T}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p12.6.m6.1a"><mi id="A3.p12.6.m6.1.1" xref="A3.p12.6.m6.1.1.cmml">𝕋</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p12.6.m6.1b"><ci id="A3.p12.6.m6.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p12.6.m6.1.1">𝕋</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p12.6.m6.1c">\mathbb{T}</annotation></semantics></math>’s cryptocurrency assets.</p>
</div>
<div id="A3.p13" class="ltx_para ltx_noindent">
<p id="A3.p13.2" class="ltx_p"><span id="A3.p13.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">SMT problem:</span>
By following the above procedures, the state transition model we presented in Section&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#S3" title="III DeFi Modeling ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">III</span></a> is now encoded as an SMT problem, where we verify if any initialization of the free variables (<math id="A3.p13.1.m1.2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="x_{1},x_{2}" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p13.1.m1.2a"><mrow id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.3.cmml"><msub id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2.cmml">x</mi><mn id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3.cmml">1</mn></msub><mo id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.3" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.3.cmml">,</mo><msub id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.cmml"><mi id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2.cmml">x</mi><mn id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3.cmml">2</mn></msub></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A3.p13.1.m1.2b"><list id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.3.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2"><apply id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.2">𝑥</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.1.1.1.1.3">1</cn></apply><apply id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.2">𝑥</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3.cmml" xref="A3.p13.1.m1.2.2.2.2.3">2</cn></apply></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p13.1.m1.2c">x_{1},x_{2}</annotation></semantics></math>) satisfies the requirement of <math id="A3.p13.2.m2.4" class="ltx_Math" alttext="t_{1}(\cdot)\land t_{2}(\cdot)\land t_{3}(\cdot)\land t_{4}(\cdot)" display="inline"><semantics id="A3.p13.2.m2.4a"><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.cmml"><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.cmml"><msub id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.cmml"><mi id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.3" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.3.cmml">1</mn></msub><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.1.cmml">​</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.3.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.cmml"><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.3.2.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.cmml">(</mo><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.1.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.1.1.cmml">⋅</mo><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.3.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.cmml">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.1.cmml">∧</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.cmml"><msub id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.2.cmml"><mi id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.2.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.2.3" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.2.3.cmml">2</mn></msub><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.1.cmml">​</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.3.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.cmml"><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.3.2.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.cmml">(</mo><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.2.2.cmml">⋅</mo><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.3.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.cmml">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.1a" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.1.cmml">∧</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.cmml"><msub id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.cmml"><mi id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.3" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.3.cmml">3</mn></msub><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.1.cmml">​</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.3.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.cmml"><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.3.2.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.cmml">(</mo><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.3.3" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.3.3.cmml">⋅</mo><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.3.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.cmml">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.1b" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.1.cmml">∧</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.cmml"><msub id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.2.cmml"><mi id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.2.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.2.2.cmml">t</mi><mn id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.2.3" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.2.3.cmml">4</mn></msub><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.1.cmml">​</mo><mrow id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.3.2" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.cmml"><mo stretchy="false" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.3.2.1" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.5.cmml">(</mo><mo id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.2">𝑡</ci><cn type="integer" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.3.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.2.2.3">1</cn></apply><ci id="A3.p13.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.1.1">⋅</ci></apply><apply id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3"><times id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.3.1"></times><apply xref="A3.p13.2.m2.2.2">⋅</ci></apply><apply id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4"><times id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.1"></times><apply id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2"><csymbol cd="ambiguous" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.1.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2">subscript</csymbol><ci id="A3.p13.2.m2.4.5.4.2.2.cmml" xref="A3.p13.2.m2.4.4">⋅</ci></apply></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A3.p13.2.m2.4c">t_{1}(\cdot)\land t_{2}(\cdot)\land t_{3}(\cdot)\land t_{4}(\cdot)</annotation></semantics></math>.</p>
</div>
</section>

<div id="A4.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A4.p1.7" class="ltx_p">Table&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A4.T6" title="TABLE VI ‣ Appendix D Z3 path pruning ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">VI</span></a> illustrates the state change frequency of the top <math id="A4.p1.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="15" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.1.m1.1a"><mn id="A4.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A4.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml">15</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.1.m1.1b"><cn type="integer" id="A4.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.1.m1.1.1">15</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.1.m1.1c">15</annotation></semantics></math> most frequently changed DeFi markets we consider in this work. The Uniswap DAI market is significantly more active than the other markets, with a state change frequency of&nbsp;<math id="A4.p1.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="27.01\%" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.2.m2.1a"><mrow id="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1" xref="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml"><mn id="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.2" xref="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.2.cmml">27.01</mn><mo id="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.1" xref="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.1.cmml">%</mo></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.2.m2.1b"><apply id="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1"><csymbol cd="latexml" id="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.1">percent</csymbol><cn type="float" id="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A4.p1.2.m2.1.1.2">27.01</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.2.m2.1c">27.01\%</annotation></semantics></math> of the blocks, while the majority&nbsp;(<math id="A4.p1.3.m3.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="78.72\%" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.3.m3.1a"><mrow id="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1" xref="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.cmml"><mn id="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.2" xref="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.2.cmml">78.72</mn><mo id="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.1" xref="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.1.cmml">%</mo></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.3.m3.1b"><apply id="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1"><csymbol cd="latexml" id="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.1">percent</csymbol><cn type="float" id="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A4.p1.3.m3.1.1.2">78.72</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.3.m3.1c">78.72\%</annotation></semantics></math>) of markets experience a frequency below <math id="A4.p1.4.m4.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="2\%" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.4.m4.1a"><mrow id="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1" xref="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.cmml"><mn id="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.2" xref="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.2.cmml">2</mn><mo id="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.1" xref="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.1.cmml">%</mo></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.4.m4.1b"><apply id="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1"><csymbol cd="latexml" id="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.1">percent</csymbol><cn type="integer" id="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A4.p1.4.m4.1.1.2">2</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.4.m4.1c">2\%</annotation></semantics></math> of the blockchain blocks. Note that every market is only involved in a subset of the&nbsp;<math id="A4.p1.5.m5.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="600" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.5.m5.1a"><mn id="A4.p1.5.m5.1.1" xref="A4.p1.5.m5.1.1.cmml">600</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.5.m5.1b"><cn type="integer" id="A4.p1.5.m5.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.5.m5.1.1">600</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.5.m5.1c">600</annotation></semantics></math> kept strategies after pruning. For example, only&nbsp;<math id="A4.p1.6.m6.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="48" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.6.m6.1a"><mn id="A4.p1.6.m6.1.1" xref="A4.p1.6.m6.1.1.cmml">48</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.6.m6.1b"><cn type="integer" id="A4.p1.6.m6.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.6.m6.1.1">48</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.6.m6.1c">48</annotation></semantics></math> out of the&nbsp;<math id="A4.p1.7.m7.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="600" display="inline"><semantics id="A4.p1.7.m7.1a"><mn id="A4.p1.7.m7.1.1" xref="A4.p1.7.m7.1.1.cmml">600</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A4.p1.7.m7.1b"><cn type="integer" id="A4.p1.7.m7.1.1.cmml" xref="A4.p1.7.m7.1.1">600</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A4.p1.7.m7.1c">600</annotation></semantics></math> strategies involve the Uniswap DAI market.</p>
</div>
<figure id="A4.T6" class="ltx_table">
<table id="A4.T6.4" class="ltx_tabular ltx_centering ltx_guessed_headers ltx_align_middle">
<thead class="ltx_thead">
<tr id="A4.T6.4.1.1" class="ltx_tr">
<th id="A4.T6.4.1.1.1" class="ltx_td ltx_align_justify ltx_align_top ltx_th ltx_th_column ltx_th_row ltx_border_tt" style="padding-left:2.0pt;padding-right:2.0pt;">
<span id="A4.T6.4.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_inline-block ltx_align_top">
<span id="A4.T6.4.1.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_p" style="width:82.5pt;"><span id="A4.T6.4.1.1.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Contract</span></span>
</span>
</th>
<th id="A4.T6.4.1.1.2" class="ltx_td ltx_align_right ltx_th ltx_th_column ltx_border_tt" style="padding-left:2.0pt;padding-right:2.0pt;"><span id="A4.T6.4.1.1.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">Count</span></th>
<th id="A4.T6.4.1.1.3" class="ltx_td ltx_align_right ltx_th ltx_th_column ltx_border_tt" style="padding-left:2.0pt;padding-right:2.0pt;"><span id="A4.T6.4.1.1.3.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_bold">State change frequency</span></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody class="ltx_tbody">
<tr id="A4.T6.4.2.1" class="ltx_tr">
<th id="A4.T6.4.2.1.1" class="ltx_td ltx_align_justify ltx_align_top ltx_th ltx_th_row ltx_border_t" style="padding-left:2.0pt;padding-right:2.0pt;">

</span></figcaption>

</section>
<section id="A5" class="ltx_appendix">
<h2 class="ltx_title ltx_title_appendix">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_appendix">Appendix E </span>Concrete encoding example for Z3</h2>

<div id="A5.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.p1.1" class="ltx_p">In this section, we provide a running example to demonstrate the encoding process of <span id="A5.p1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_smallcaps">DeFiPoser-SMT</span>. The example performs an arbitrage at block <math id="A5.p1.1.m1.3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="9,680,000" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.p1.1.m1.3a"><mrow id="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.2" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml"><mn id="A5.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml">9</mn><mo id="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.2.1" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A5.p1.1.m1.2.2" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.2.2.cmml">680</mn><mo id="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.2.2" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A5.p1.1.m1.3.3" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.3.3.cmml">000</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.p1.1.m1.3b"><list id="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.3.4.2"><cn type="integer" id="A5.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.1.1">9</cn><cn type="integer" id="A5.p1.1.m1.2.2.cmml" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.2.2">680</cn><cn type="integer" id="A5.p1.1.m1.3.3.cmml" xref="A5.p1.1.m1.3.3">000</cn></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.p1.1.m1.3c">9,680,000</annotation></semantics></math>, which first converts ETH to BNT on Bancor and then converts BNT back to ETH on Uniswap.</p>
</div>
<section id="A5.SS1" class="ltx_subsection">
<h3 class="ltx_title ltx_title_subsection">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_subsection"><span id="A5.SS1.5.1.1" class="ltx_text">E-A</span> </span><span id="A5.SS1.6.2" class="ltx_text ltx_font_italic">Initial state encoding</span>
</h3>

<div id="A5.SS1.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS1.p1.1" class="ltx_p">The initial state encoding consists of the predicates for both the trader <math id="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\mathbb{T}" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1a"><mi id="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml">𝕋</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1b"><ci id="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1.1">𝕋</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.SS1.p1.1.m1.1c">\mathbb{T}</annotation></semantics></math>’s initial balances, as well as the initial states of the underlying platforms.</p>
</div>
<div id="A5.SS1.p2" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS1.p2.1" class="ltx_p ltx_align_left"><span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_align_left ltx_inline-block" style="font-size:70%;width:426.6pt;background-color:#EDEDED;">
<span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1" class="ltx_inline-block ltx_align_bottom">
<span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">#&nbsp;Trader’s&nbsp;initial&nbsp;state.</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.2" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">#&nbsp;We&nbsp;assume&nbsp;the&nbsp;trader&nbsp;holds&nbsp;1000&nbsp;ETH&nbsp;at&nbsp;the&nbsp;start.</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.3" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.3.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Attacker[BNT]&nbsp;==&nbsp;0,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.4" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p2.1.1.1.4.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Attacker[ETH]&nbsp;==&nbsp;1000000000000000000000,</span></span>
</span></span></p>
</div>
<div id="A5.SS1.p3" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS1.p3.1" class="ltx_p ltx_align_left"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_align_left ltx_inline-block" style="font-size:70%;width:426.6pt;background-color:#EDEDED;">
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1" class="ltx_inline-block ltx_align_bottom">
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">#&nbsp;Initial&nbsp;states&nbsp;of&nbsp;the&nbsp;underlying&nbsp;platforms.</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.2" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Uniswap[BNT]_eth&nbsp;==&nbsp;135368255883939133529,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.3" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.3.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Uniswap[BNT]_erc20&nbsp;==&nbsp;108143877658121296155075,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.4" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.4.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Bancor[ETH]_erc20&nbsp;==&nbsp;10936591981278719837125,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.5" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.5.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Bancor[ETH]_erc20_ratio&nbsp;==&nbsp;500000,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.6" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.6.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Bancor[ETH]_bnt&nbsp;==&nbsp;8792249012668956788248921,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.7" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.7.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Bancor[ETH]_bnt_ratio&nbsp;==&nbsp;500000,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.8" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS1.p3.1.1.1.8.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S0_Bancor[ETH]_fee&nbsp;==&nbsp;1000,</span></span>
</span></span></p>
</div>
</section>
<section id="A5.SS2" class="ltx_subsection">
<h3 class="ltx_title ltx_title_subsection">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_subsection"><span id="A5.SS2.5.1.1" class="ltx_text">E-B</span> </span><span id="A5.SS2.6.2" class="ltx_text ltx_font_italic">Action encoding</span>
</h3>

<div id="A5.SS2.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS2.p1.4" class="ltx_p">We encode the two transition actions as predicates. <math id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="P1" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1a"><mrow id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.2" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.2.cmml">P</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.1" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.1.cmml">​</mo><mn id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.3" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.3.cmml">1</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1b"><apply id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1"><times id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.1"></times><ci id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.2">𝑃</ci><cn type="integer" id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1.1.3">1</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.SS2.p1.1.m1.1c">P1</annotation></semantics></math> is the input parameter for action <math id="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="1" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1a"><mn id="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1.1" xref="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml">1</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1b"><cn type="integer" id="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1.1">1</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.SS2.p1.2.m2.1c">1</annotation></semantics></math> (converts ETH to BNT on Bancor), and <math id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="P2" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1a"><mrow id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.cmml"><mi id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.2" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.2.cmml">P</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em" id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.1" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.1.cmml">​</mo><mn id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.3" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.3.cmml">2</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1b"><apply id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1"><times id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.1"></times><ci id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.2">𝑃</ci><cn type="integer" id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.3.cmml" xref="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1.1.3">2</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.SS2.p1.3.m3.1c">P2</annotation></semantics></math> is the input parameter for action <math <div id="A5.SS2.p2" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS2.p2.1" class="ltx_p ltx_align_left"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_align_left ltx_inline-block" style="font-size:70%;width:426.6pt;background-color:#EDEDED;">
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1" class="ltx_inline-block ltx_align_bottom">

<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.2" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">P1&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;0,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.3" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.3.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S1_Bancor[ETH]_bnt&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;0,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.4" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.4.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S1_Attacker[BNT]&nbsp;==</span></span>

<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.6" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.6.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(S0_Bancor[ETH]_bnt*</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.7" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.7.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1&nbsp;-</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.8" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.8.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(S0_Bancor[ETH]_erc20/(S0_Bancor[ETH]_erc20&nbsp;+&nbsp;P1))**</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.9" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.9.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(S0_Bancor[ETH]_erc20_ratio/S0_Bancor[ETH]_bnt_ratio))*</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.10" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.10.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1000000&nbsp;-&nbsp;S0_Bancor[ETH]_fee)**2)/</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.11" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.11.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1000000000000,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.12" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p2.1.1.1.12.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S1_Attacker[ETH]&nbsp;==&nbsp;S0_Attacker[ETH]&nbsp;-&nbsp;P1,</span></span>

<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1" class="ltx_inline-block ltx_align_bottom">
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">#&nbsp;converts&nbsp;BNT&nbsp;to&nbsp;ETH&nbsp;on&nbsp;Uniswap</span></span>

<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.3" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.3.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">P2&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;0,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.4" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.4.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S2_Attacker[BNT]&nbsp;==&nbsp;S1_Attacker[BNT]&nbsp;-&nbsp;P2,</span></span>

<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.6" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.6.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;S1_Attacker[ETH]&nbsp;+</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.7" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.7.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(997*P2*S1_Uniswap[BNT]_eth)/</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.8" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.8.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(S1_Uniswap[BNT]_erc20*1000&nbsp;+&nbsp;997*P2),</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.9" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.9.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S2_Uniswap[BNT]_eth&nbsp;==</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.10" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.10.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;S1_Uniswap[BNT]_eth&nbsp;-</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.11" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.11.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(997*P2*S1_Uniswap[BNT]_eth)/</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.12" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.12.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(S1_Uniswap[BNT]_erc20*1000&nbsp;+&nbsp;997*P2),</span></span>

<span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.14" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS2.p3.1.1.1.14.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S2_Bancor[ETH]_bnt&nbsp;==&nbsp;S1_Bancor[ETH]_bnt,</span></span>

</section>
<section id="A5.SS3" class="ltx_subsection">
<h3 class="ltx_title ltx_title_subsection">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_subsection"><span id="A5.SS3.5.1.1" class="ltx_text">E-C</span> </span><span id="A5.SS3.6.2" class="ltx_text ltx_font_italic">Objective encoding</span>
</h3>

<div id="A5.SS3.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS3.p1.2" class="ltx_p">In this example, we check if it is possible for the trader <math id="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\mathbb{T}" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1a"><mi id="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml">𝕋</mi><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1b"><ci id="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1.1">𝕋</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.SS3.p1.1.m1.1c">\mathbb{T}</annotation></semantics></math> to realize <math id="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="1" display="inline"><semantics id="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1a"><mn id="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1.1" xref="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml">1</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1b"><cn type="integer" id="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1.1">1</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A5.SS3.p1.2.m2.1c">1</annotation></semantics></math> ETH of revenue following this path.</p>
</div>
<div id="A5.SS3.p2" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A5.SS3.p2.1" class="ltx_p ltx_align_left"><span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_align_left ltx_inline-block" style="font-size:70%;width:426.6pt;background-color:#EDEDED;">
<span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1" class="ltx_inline-block ltx_align_bottom">
<span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">#&nbsp;Objective&nbsp;encoding</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1.2" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S2_Attacker[BNT]&nbsp;==&nbsp;0,</span></span>
<span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1.3" class="ltx_p"><span id="A5.SS3.p2.1.1.1.3.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_typewriter">S2_Attacker[ETH]&nbsp;&gt;=&nbsp;1001000000000000000000</span></span>
</span></span></p>
</div>
</section>
</section>
<section id="A6" class="ltx_appendix">
<h2 class="ltx_title ltx_title_appendix">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_appendix">Appendix F </span>Optimizer for the SMT solver</h2>

<div id="A6.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A6.p1.1" class="ltx_p">Algorithm&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#alg3" title="In Appendix F Optimizer for the SMT solver ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">3</span></a> shows how the SMT solver can maximize a path’s revenue using binary search.</p>
</div>

</div>

</div>
<div id="alg3.2.2" class="ltx_listingline">
<span id="alg3.2.2.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_italic">m</span> <math id="alg3.2.2.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\leftarrow" display="inline"><semantics id="alg3.2.2.m1.1a"><mo stretchy="false" id="alg3.2.2.m1.1.1" xref="alg3.2.2.m1.1.1.cmml">←</mo><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="alg3.2.2.m1.1b"><ci id="alg3.2.2.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="alg3.2.2.m1.1.1">←</ci></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="alg3.2.2.m1.1c">\leftarrow</annotation></semantics></math> Minimum revenue target

<section id="A7" class="ltx_appendix">
<h2 class="ltx_title ltx_title_appendix">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_appendix">Appendix G </span>State Dependency</h2>

<div id="A7.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A7.p1.5" class="ltx_p">We visualize the state changes in Figure&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A7.F15" title="Figure 15 ‣ Appendix G State Dependency ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">15</span></a>. This figure provides an intuition to a trader on how active a particular market is. An asset changes state if a market listing that asset changes state (i.e., a trader trades the asset). ETH experiences the most state changes with over&nbsp;<math id="A7.p1.1.m1.2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="950,000" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.p1.1.m1.2a"><mrow id="A7.p1.1.m1.2.3.2" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.2.3.1.cmml"><mn id="A7.p1.1.m1.1.1" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml">950</mn><mo id="A7.p1.1.m1.2.3.2.1" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.2.3.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A7.p1.1.m1.2.2" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.2.2.cmml">000</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.p1.1.m1.2b"><list id="A7.p1.1.m1.2.3.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.2.3.2"><cn type="integer" id="A7.p1.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.1.1">950</cn><cn type="integer" id="A7.p1.1.m1.2.2.cmml" xref="A7.p1.1.m1.2.2">000</cn></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.p1.1.m1.2c">950,000</annotation></semantics></math> blocks&nbsp;(<math id="A7.p1.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="36.76\%" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.p1.2.m2.1a"><mrow id="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1" xref="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml"><mn id="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.2" xref="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.2.cmml">36.76</mn><mo id="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.1" xref="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.1.cmml">%</mo></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.p1.2.m2.1b"><apply id="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1"><csymbol cd="latexml" id="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.1">percent</csymbol><cn type="float" id="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A7.p1.2.m2.1.1.2">36.76</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.p1.2.m2.1c">36.76\%</annotation></semantics></math>). After ETH, we observe that DAI&nbsp;(<math id="A7.p1.3.m3.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="14.62\%" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.p1.3.m3.1a"><mrow id="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1" xref="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.cmml"><mn id="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.2" xref="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.2.cmml">14.62</mn><mo id="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.1" xref="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.1.cmml">%</mo></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.p1.3.m3.1b"><apply id="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1"><csymbol cd="latexml" id="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.1">percent</csymbol><cn type="float" id="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A7.p1.3.m3.1.1.2">14.62</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.p1.3.m3.1c">14.62\%</annotation></semantics></math>) experiences the most frequent state changes over the&nbsp;<math id="A7.p1.4.m4.2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="950,000" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.p1.4.m4.2a"><mrow id="A7.p1.4.m4.2.3.2" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.2.3.1.cmml"><mn id="A7.p1.4.m4.1.1" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.1.1.cmml">950</mn><mo id="A7.p1.4.m4.2.3.2.1" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.2.3.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A7.p1.4.m4.2.2" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.2.2.cmml">000</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.p1.4.m4.2b"><list id="A7.p1.4.m4.2.3.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.2.3.2"><cn type="integer" id="A7.p1.4.m4.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.1.1">950</cn><cn type="integer" id="A7.p1.4.m4.2.2.cmml" xref="A7.p1.4.m4.2.2">000</cn></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.p1.4.m4.2c">950,000</annotation></semantics></math> blocks we crawled. POA20 has the lowest number of state changes&nbsp;(<math id="A7.p1.5.m5.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="0.08\%" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.p1.5.m5.1a"><mrow id="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1" xref="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.cmml"><mn id="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.2" xref="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.2.cmml">0.08</mn><mo id="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.1" xref="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.1.cmml">%</mo></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.p1.5.m5.1b"><apply id="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1"><csymbol cd="latexml" id="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.1">percent</csymbol><cn type="float" id="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.2.cmml" xref="A7.p1.5.m5.1.1.2">0.08</cn></apply></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.p1.5.m5.1c">0.08\%</annotation></semantics></math>). For a trader who is not able to position its transactions first in a block, the market activity is relevant because a strategy executed on the POA20 asset has a higher likelihood to succeed than on an active DAI market.</p>
</div>
<figure id="A7.F15" class="ltx_figure"><img src="./[2103.02228] On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols_files/dependency.png" id="A7.F15.g1" class="ltx_graphics ltx_centering ltx_img_landscape" width="598" height="294" alt="Refer to caption">
<figcaption class="ltx_caption ltx_centering"><span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_figure"><span id="A7.F15.6.3.1" class="ltx_text" style="font-size:90%;">Figure 15</span>: </span><span id="A7.F15.4.2" class="ltx_text" style="font-size:90%;">
Timeline analysis of the state changes, over&nbsp;<math id="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="150" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1b"><mn id="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1.1" xref="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1.1.cmml">150</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1c"><cn type="integer" id="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1.1">150</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.F15.3.1.m1.1d">150</annotation></semantics></math> days&nbsp;(<math id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2" class="ltx_Math" alttext="950,000" display="inline"><semantics id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2b"><mrow id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.3.2" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.3.1.cmml"><mn id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.1.1" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.1.1.cmml">950</mn><mo id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.3.2.1" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.3.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.2" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.2.cmml">000</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2c"><list id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.3.1.cmml" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.3.2"><cn type="integer" id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.1.1">950</cn><cn type="integer" id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.2.cmml" xref="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2.2">000</cn></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A7.F15.4.2.m2.2d">950,000</annotation></semantics></math> blocks), where every state change is represented with a colored tick.</span></figcaption>
</figure>
</section>
<section id="A8" class="ltx_appendix">
<h2 class="ltx_title ltx_title_appendix">
<span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_appendix">Appendix H </span>bZx</h2>

<div id="A8.p1" class="ltx_para">
<p id="A8.p1.1" class="ltx_p">Figure&nbsp;<a href="https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/2103.02228#A8.F16" title="Figure 16 ‣ Appendix H bZx ‣ On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols" class="ltx_ref"><span class="ltx_text ltx_ref_tag">16</span></a> shows our attack window analysis of the bZx attack using <span id="A8.p1.1.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_smallcaps">DeFiPoser-SMT</span>.</p>
</div>
<figure id="A8.F16" class="ltx_figure"><img src="./[2103.02228] On the Just-In-Time Discovery of Profit-Generating Transactions in DeFi Protocols_files/bzx_time_revenue.png" id="A8.F16.g1" class="ltx_graphics ltx_centering ltx_img_landscape" width="598" height="293" alt="Refer to caption">
<figcaption class="ltx_caption ltx_centering"><span class="ltx_tag ltx_tag_figure"><span id="A8.F16.11.5.1" class="ltx_text" style="font-size:90%;">Figure 16</span>: </span><span id="A8.F16.8.4" class="ltx_text" style="font-size:90%;">Attack window analysis of the bZx attack. <span id="A8.F16.8.4.1" class="ltx_text ltx_font_smallcaps">DeFiPoser-SMT</span> finds the first attack opportunity at block&nbsp;<math id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="9,069,000" display="inline"><semantics id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3b"><mrow id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.2" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml"><mn id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.1.1" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.1.1.cmml">9</mn><mo id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.2.1" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.2.2" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.2.2.cmml">069</mn><mo id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.2.2" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.3" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.3.cmml">000</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3c"><list id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.1.cmml" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.4.2"><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.1.1.cmml" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.1.1">9</cn><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.2.2.cmml" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.2.2">069</cn><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.3.cmml" xref="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3.3">000</cn></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A8.F16.5.1.m1.3d">9,069,000</annotation></semantics></math> (December 8th 2019). The opportunity lasted for&nbsp;<math id="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="69" display="inline"><semantics id="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1b"><mn id="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1.1" xref="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1.1.cmml">69</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1c"><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1.1.cmml" xref="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1.1">69</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A8.F16.6.2.m2.1d">69</annotation></semantics></math> days, until the opportunity was exploited in block&nbsp;<math id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3" class="ltx_Math" alttext="9,484,687" display="inline"><semantics id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3b"><mrow id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.2" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.1.cmml"><mn id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.1.1" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.1.1.cmml">9</mn><mo id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.2.1" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.2.2" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.2.2.cmml">484</mn><mo id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.2.2" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.1.cmml">,</mo><mn id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.3" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.3.cmml">687</mn></mrow><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3c"><list id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.1.cmml" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.4.2"><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.1.1.cmml" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.1.1">9</cn><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.2.2.cmml" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.2.2">484</cn><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.3.cmml" xref="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3.3">687</cn></list></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A8.F16.7.3.m3.3d">9,484,687</annotation></semantics></math> (February 15th 2020). We visualize the difference between the profits from Z3 and concrete validation, along with the success rate (using block bin sizes of <math id="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="100" display="inline"><semantics id="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1b"><mn id="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1.1" xref="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1.1.cmml">100</mn><annotation-xml encoding="MathML-Content" id="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1c"><cn type="integer" id="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1.1.cmml" xref="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1.1">100</cn></annotation-xml><annotation encoding="application/x-tex" id="A8.F16.8.4.m4.1d">100</annotation></semantics></math>) of a Z3 strategy passing concrete validation. Note that the bZx loan interest rate formula is conservatively simplified in the encoding process, which explains why the Z3 anticipated revenue is lower than the concrete execution yield.</span></figcaption>
</figure>
<div class="ltx_pagination ltx_role_newpage"></div>

    <script>
    // Auxiliary function, building the preview feature when
    // an inline citation is clicked
    function clicked_cite(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      let cite = this.closest('.ltx_cite');
      let next = cite.nextSibling;
      if (next && next.nodeType == Node.ELEMENT_NODE && next.getAttribute('class') == "ar5iv-bibitem-preview") {
        next.remove();
        return; }
      // Before adding a preview modal,
      // cleanup older previews, in case they're still open
      document.querySelectorAll('span.ar5iv-bibitem-preview').forEach(function(node) {
        node.remove();
      })

      // Create the preview
      preview = document.createElement('span');
      preview.setAttribute('class','ar5iv-bibitem-preview');
      let target = document.getElementById(this.getAttribute('href').slice(1));
      target.childNodes.forEach(function (child) {
        preview.append(child.cloneNode(true));
      });
      let close_x = document.createElement('button');
      close_x.setAttribute("aria-label","Close modal for bibliography item preview");
      close_x.textContent = "×";
      close_x.setAttribute('class', 'ar5iv-button-close-preview');
      close_x.setAttribute('onclick','this.parentNode.remove()');
      preview.append(close_x);
      preview.querySelectorAll('.ltx_tag_bibitem').forEach(function(node) {
        node.remove();
      });
      cite.parentNode.insertBefore(preview, cite.nextSibling);
      return;
    }
    // Global Document initialization:
    // - assign the preview feature to all inline citation links
    document.querySelectorAll(".ltx_cite .ltx_ref").forEach(function (link) {
      link.addEventListener("click", clicked_cite);
    });
    </script>
